title: One dead, four injured in Raleigh wreck following police chase :: WRAL.com
text:
One dead, four injured in Raleigh wreck following police chase 
Posted 15 minutes ago Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * Are you human? * You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters 
A person died in a car accident on Hammond Road near Interstate 40 following a police chase. There were two cars involved in the wreck, according to Raleigh police. 
The passenger in the suspect vehicle died, and the driver is in critical condition. 
From a second vehicle, one person is in critical condition and two people were injured but expected to recover. 
Garner police investigated the chase, and Raleigh police investigated the accident. Credits
